title: Tesla 15min Indicators Tool (Short-Term AI Technical Analysis)
author: Don Jayamaha Jr

{"id":"WNeFPeTpGr4F6knx","meta":{"instanceId":"a5283507e1917a33cc3ae615b2e7d5ad2c1e50955e6f831272ddd5ab816f3fb6","templateCredsSetupCompleted":true},"name":"Tesla 15min Indicators Tool n8n","tags":[],"nodes":[{"id":"0ce5c7ad-3c00-4df1-8acd-afb36edad51b","name":"When Executed by Another Workflow","type":"n8n-nodes-base.executeWorkflowTrigger","position":[100,520],"parameters":{"workflowInputs":{"values":[{"name":"message"},{"name":"sessionId"}]}},"typeVersion":1.1},{"id":"8b3a63a1-7396-44e4-aa76-7219c9a23475","name":"Simple Memory","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.memoryBufferWindow","position":[660,840],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1.3},{"id":"7e7e41c0-6252-4b5c-b19e-b987ed062a58","name":"Tesla 15min Indicators Agent","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent","position":[540,520],"parameters":{"text":"={{ $json.message }}","options":{"systemMessage":"You are the **Tesla 15-Minute Technical Indicators Analyst AI**.

Your role is to analyze short-term market momentum and structure for **Tesla (TSLA)** using technical indicators at the **15-minute interval**. You operate as part of a modular system using **webhook-triggered HTTP calls** that retrieve and preprocess indicator data before reaching you.

---

### üîå Data Flow Overview:

* You receive your input via a **webhook**.
* That webhook calls upstream **n8n HTTP Request Nodes** connected to **Alpha Vantage API**.
* Each indicator is fetched independently, then passed through **Tool Code Nodes** that extract and limit the output to the **latest 20 data points**.
* You are the final consumer of the fully formatted and clean technical data.

---

### üìä Connected Indicators (6 total):

You receive and interpret the following indicators:

1. **RSI (Relative Strength Index)** ‚Äì Detects overbought/oversold pressure.
2. **MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)** ‚Äì Measures trend reversals and momentum shifts.
3. **BBANDS (Bollinger Bands)** ‚Äì Volatility and potential breakout conditions.
4. **SMA (Simple Moving Average)** ‚Äì Baseline trend confirmation.
5. **EMA (Exponential Moving Average)** ‚Äì Captures short-term trend sensitivity.
6. **ADX (Average Directional Index)** ‚Äì Evaluates trend strength.

---

### üß† Responsibilities:

1. Parse the final formatted JSON payload for each indicator.
2. Use these indicators to assess:

   * Short-term trend strength
   * Momentum exhaustion or continuation
   * Volatility conditions
3. Output a compact analysis with:

   * Summary of market state
   * Most recent values for each indicator

---

### üßæ Output Format:

```json
{
  "summary": "TSLA shows fading momentum. RSI dropped below 60, MACD is flattening, and BBANDS are tightening. Expect short-term consolidation.",
  "timeframe": "15m",
  "indicators": {
    "RSI": 58.3,
    "MACD": {
      "macd": -0.020,
      "signal": -0.018,
      "histogram": -0.002
    },
    "BBANDS": {
      "upper": 183.10,
      "lower": 176.70,
      "middle": 179.90,
      "close": 177.60
    },
    "SMA": 178.20,
    "EMA": 177.70,
    "ADX": 19.6
  }
}
```

---

Keep your tone professional and your insights concise. Only base conclusions on clear indicator signals. This output will be passed directly to the **Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool** for final trading signal generation.

Only the latest **20 values** are returned, cleaned and trimmed."},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"6f9e64bf-e1ae-4d12-81da-cc1c0f2e8596","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[440,280],"parameters":{"color":5,"width":480,"height":440,"content":"## Tesla 15-minute Technical Indicators AI

‚Ä¢ This feeds into the broader **Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst**."},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"e05e507d-8d73-4bbd-b147-9d1c4d8e0a81","name":"Sticky Note4","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[1360,-900],"parameters":{"width":1560,"height":2200,"content":"## üìò Tesla 15min Indicators Tool

### üîß Purpose:

This workflow analyzes **short-term market conditions** for Tesla (TSLA) using a comprehensive set of technical indicators on the **15-minute timeframe**. It is designed for **scalping signals**, **intraday volatility**, and **momentum evaluation**, feeding its insights into the **Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool**.

---

### üìÇ Required Dependencies (to use this workflow):

To function correctly, you must also have:

* ‚úÖ **Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool** (calls this agent)
* ‚úÖ **Tesla 15min Webhook Tool** (fetches Alpha Vantage indicator data via webhook)
* ‚úÖ **Alpha Vantage Premium API Key** (added as an HTTP Query Auth credential)

---

### üõ†Ô∏è Step-by-Step Installation:

1. **Import Workflow**
   Import this JSON file into your **n8n instance**.

2. **Set up API Credentials**

   * Go to **Credentials ‚Üí Create New**
   * Choose **HTTP Query Auth**
   * Name it: `Alpha Vantage Premium`
   * Use your **premium API key** as the query value

3. **Link to Webhook Source**
   This workflow expects **cleaned Alpha Vantage data** (latest 20 data points) from:
   üëâ `Tesla_Quant_Technical_Indicators_Webhooks_Tool`

4. **Review Node Roles**

   * `15min Data` ‚Üí Pulls indicator data via webhook (RSI, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX, MACD)
   * `Tesla 15min Indicators Agent` ‚Üí AI Reasoning (LangChain Agent)
   * `OpenAI Chat Model` ‚Üí GPT-4.1 or Gemini Pro
   * `Simple Memory` ‚Üí Stores context for session continuity

---

### üß† AI Agent Logic:

* Accepts **latest 20 data points** per indicator
* Detects:

  * Overbought/Oversold (RSI)
  * Trend Strength (ADX)
  * Breakout Conditions (BBANDS)
  * Moving Average Crossovers (SMA & EMA)
  * MACD-based momentum shifts
* Outputs structured JSON for Tesla Financial Analyst Tool like:

```json
{
  "summary": "TSLA shows fading momentum. RSI dropped below 60, MACD is flattening, and BBANDS are tightening. Expect short-term consolidation.",
  "timeframe": "15m",
  "indicators": {
    "RSI": 58.3,
    "MACD": {
      "macd": -0.020,
      "signal": -0.018,
      "histogram": -0.002
    },
    "BBANDS": {
      "upper": 183.10,
      "lower": 176.70,
      "middle": 179.90,
      "close": 177.60
    },
    "SMA": 178.20,
    "EMA": 177.70,
    "ADX": 19.6
  }
}
```

---

### üîÅ Trigger Flow:

* This workflow is **not triggered independently**
* It is called using **Execute Workflow Trigger** from:
  üëâ `Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool`

---

readme:
‚è±Ô∏è **Analyze Tesla (TSLA) short-term market structure and momentum using 6 technical indicators on the 15-minute timeframe.**  
This AI agent tool is part of the **Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent** system. It is designed to detect intraday shifts in volatility, trend strength, and potential reversal signals.

‚ö†Ô∏è **Not standalone.** This agent is triggered via `Execute Workflow` by the [Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/XXXX).

üîå **Requires:**

  * `Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks Tool`
  * `Alpha Vantage Premium API Key`



* * *

## üìä What It Does

This workflow pulls the **latest 20 data points** for 6 key technical indicators from a webhook-powered source, then uses **GPT-4.1** to interpret market momentum and structure:

### Connected Indicators:

  * **RSI (Relative Strength Index)**
  * **MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)**
  * **BBANDS (Bollinger Bands)**
  * **SMA (Simple Moving Average)**
  * **EMA (Exponential Moving Average)**
  * **ADX (Average Directional Index)**



The output is a structured JSON with:

  * Market summary
  * Timeframe (`15m`)
  * Indicator values



* * *

### üìã Sample Output
    
    
    {
      "summary": "TSLA shows fading momentum. RSI dropped below 60, MACD is flattening, and BBANDS are tightening. Expect short-term consolidation.",
      "timeframe": "15m",
      "indicators": {
        "RSI": 58.3,
        "MACD": {
          "macd": -0.020,
          "signal": -0.018,
          "histogram": -0.002
        },
        "BBANDS": {
          "upper": 183.10,
          "lower": 176.70,
          "middle": 179.90,
          "close": 177.60
        },
        "SMA": 178.20,
        "EMA": 177.70,
        "ADX": 19.6
      }
    }
    

* * *

## üß† Agent Components

Module | Role  
---|---  
**Webhook Data Node** | Calls `/15minData` endpoint for Alpha Vantage indicators  
**LangChain Agent** | Parses indicator payloads and generates reasoning  
**OpenAI GPT-4.1** | Powers the AI logic to interpret technical structure  
**Memory Module** | Maintains session consistency for multi-agent calls  
  
* * *

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Instructions

  1. **Import Workflow into n8n**  
Name it: `Tesla_15min_Indicators_Tool`

  2. **Configure Webhook Source**

     * Install and publish: `Tesla_Quant_Technical_Indicators_Webhooks_Tool`
     * Ensure `/15minData` is publicly reachable (or tunnel-enabled)
  3. **Add Credentials**

     * Alpha Vantage API Key (`HTTP Query Auth`)
     * OpenAI GPT-4.1 (`OpenAI Chat Model`)
  4. **Link as Sub-Agent**  
This workflow is not triggered manually. It is executed using `Execute Workflow` by:  
üëâ `Tesla_Financial_Market_Data_Analyst_Tool`  
Pass in:

     * `message` (optional)
     * `sessionId` (for short-term memory linkage)



* * *

## üìå Sticky Notes Summary

üü¢ **Trigger Integration** ‚Äì Receives `sessionId` and `message` from parent  
üü° **Webhook Fetcher** ‚Äì Pulls Alpha Vantage data from `/15minData`  
üß† **GPT-4.1 Reasoning** ‚Äì Produces structured JSON insight  
üîµ **Session Memory** ‚Äì Maintains evaluation flow across tools  
üìò **Tool Description** ‚Äì Explains indicator use and AI output format

* * *

## üîí Licensing & Author

¬© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**  
All logic, formatting, and agent design are protected under copyright. No resale or public re-use without permission.

Created by: [Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)  
Creator Profile: <https://n8n.io/creators/don-the-gem-dealer/>

* * *

üöÄ **Build faster intraday Tesla trading models using clean 15-minute indicator insights‚Äîprocessed by AI.**  
**Required by the Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool.**

This AI agent tool is part of the Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent system. It is designed to detect intraday shifts in volatility, trend strength, and potential reversal signals.

‚ö†Ô∏è Not standalone. This agent is triggered via Execute Workflow by the Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool.

üîå Requires:

  • Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks Tool
  • Alpha Vantage Premium API Key

üìä What It Does

This workflow pulls the latest 20 data points for 6 key technical indicators from a webhook-powered source, then uses GPT-4.1 to interpret market momentum and structure:

Connected Indicators:

  • RSI (Relative Strength Index)
  • MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)
  • BBANDS (Bollinger Bands)
  • SMA (Simple Moving Average)
  • EMA (Exponential Moving Average)
  • ADX (Average Directional Index)

The output is a structured JSON with:

  • Market summary
  • Timeframe (15m)
  • Indicator values

{
